# Auto generated please do not edit this file
# Directory GettingStarted
if (NOT RDM_TOP)
    project(RDM)
    set (RDMEmbedded_VERSION_MAJOR 11)
    set (RDMEmbedded_VERSION_MINOR 0)

    CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED(VERSION 2.6)

    if (${CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME} STREQUAL Windows)
        GET_FILENAME_COMPONENT (RDM_HOME "[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SOFTWARE\\Raima\\Raima Database Manager\\11.0;InstallPath]" ABSOLUTE CACHE)
    else ()
        if (EXISTS InstallDir.cmake)
            include (InstallDir.cmake)
        else ()
            if (DEFINED ENV{RDM_HOME})
                GET_FILENAME_COMPONENT (RDM_HOME "$ENV{RDM_HOME}" ABSOLUTE CACHE)
            else ()
                GET_FILENAME_COMPONENT (RDM_HOME "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/.." ABSOLUTE CACHE)
            endif ()
        endif ()
    endif ()
    include ("${RDM_HOME}/CMake/Macros.txt")

    include_directories ("${RDM_HOME}/include")

    set (INSTALL_DIR "${RDM_HOME}/CMake")
    find_package (INSTALL)
endif ()


include_directories (
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}
)

subdirectories (
    examples
    tutorials
)
